CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The UV - vis absorption spectra of all polymers in both chlorobenzene solution ( 1 × 10^-3 mg mL -1 ) and as thin films ( spin - casted from chlorobenzene solutions with concentration of 8 mg mL -1 ) are shown in Figure 2.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| all polymers in chlorobenzene solution (1 × 10^-3 mg mL^-1) |
| all polymers in thin films (spin-casted from chlorobenzene solutions with concentration of 8 mg mL^-1) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| all polymers in chlorobenzene solution (1 × 10^-3 mg mL^-1) |
| all polymers in thin films (spin-casted from chlorobenzene solutions with concentration of 8 mg mL^-1) |

These entities clearly refer to materials (polymers) in different states (solution and thin films).

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The UV - vis absorption spectra of all polymers in both chlorobenzene solution ( 1 × 10^-3 mg mL -1 ) and as thin films ( spin - casted from chlorobenzene solutions with concentration of 8 mg mL -1 ) are shown in Figure 2.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| UV-vis absorption spectra |
| of all polymers |
| in chlorobenzene solution |
| with a concentration of 1 × 10^-3 mg mL^-1 |
| as thin films |
| spin-casted from chlorobenzene solutions |
| with a concentration of 8 mg mL^-1 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| UV-vis absorption spectra of all polymers in chlorobenzene solution with a concentration of 1 × 10^-3 mg mL^-1 |
| UV-vis absorption spectra of all polymers as thin films spin-casted from chlorobenzene solutions with a concentration of 8 mg mL^-1 |

The entities "chlorobenzene solution" and "thin films" do not clearly refer to material properties, but rather to the experimental conditions used to measure the material properties. Therefore, they have been removed from the table.
